name: ReplaceTokens
description: Replaces tokens in a file using RegEx. Values come from any variable defined in the current Environment.
author: Colin Dembovsky (colinsalmcorner.com)

inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file(s) containing tokens.

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.label: Target File Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: File pattern to find in source path. Supports minimatch.

inputs.name: tokenRegex
inputs.label: Token Regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regex to use for token replacement. Must include a group match.

inputs.name: secretTokens
inputs.label: Secret Tokens
inputs.helpMarkDown: A configuration variable can be set as 'secret' in release definition to have its value hidden. For tokens need to be replaced with the value of secret configuration variables, they can be specified here using the following format: key1:$(secret1);key2:$(secret2). Non-secret configuration variable do not need to be specified explicitly here.
